name: Pig Game
label: Featured Project
desc: In this game, two players will have to compete to reach 100pts by rolling a dice. Wait! if you roll a 1, all your accumulated value goes down to 0. The strategy is to use the hold button to save any accumulated number. When a value is held, it adds to your overall total points and rolling a 1 will not affect that.
